issue.message: All com.android.support libraries must use the exact same version specification (mixing versions can lead to runtime crashes). Found versions 25.3.1, 24.1.0. Examples include `com.android.support:animated-vector-drawable:25.3.1` and `com.android.support:support-v4:24.1.0`
A newer version of com.google.android.gms:play-services-wearable than 10.2.1 is available: 11.0.4
